description:
Oud Blanc Eau De Parfum - Luxury Redefined

Experience the captivating allure of Oud Blanc Eau De Parfum, a masterful blend that elevates the iconic oud to new heights of sophistication. This exquisite 75ml fragrance balances the rich, woody depth of traditional oud with unexpected notes of luminous brightness, creating a scent profile that's both timeless and thoroughly modern. âœ¨

The Essence of Oud Blanc

This exceptional Arabic perfume opens with a sparkling citrus accord that immediately captivates the senses. As it develops, the heart reveals a sophisticated blend of rare florals and spices that dance around the star ingredient â€“ a meticulously sourced white oud that brings lightness to what is traditionally a heavy note. The base notes provide longevity and depth, making this fragrance perfect for those who appreciate the artistry of fine perfumery. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 75ml
Gender Unisex
Product Type Eau De Parfum
Concentration High (15-20%)
Brand Luxury Collection

Fragrance Journey of Oud Blanc

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Bergamot, Lemon Zest, Saffron
Heart Notes White Oud, Rose, Jasmine, Cardamom
Base Notes Sandalwood, Amber, Vanilla, White Musk

Key Features of Oud Blanc:

  • Exceptional longevity (8+ hours) and moderate sillage ðŸ’Ž
  • Unique white oud formulation for a lighter, more versatile interpretation
  • Elegant glass bottle with hand-finished details
  • Suitable for both day and evening wear
  • Versatile for all seasons, particularly stunning in cooler weather ðŸŒ¿
  • Part of our best sellers collection

The Art of Oud Blanc

Drawing inspiration from traditional Middle Eastern perfumery while embracing modern Western techniques, Oud Blanc represents the perfect harmony between heritage and innovation. The perfumers behind this exceptional creation spent years perfecting the formula, sourcing the finest white oud and complementary ingredients to create a signature scent that stands apart from conventional oud fragrances. ðŸŒ¸

This new arrival has already garnered attention from fragrance enthusiasts and critics alike for its sophisticated interpretation of one of perfumery's most treasured ingredients. The Oud Blanc experience is one of refined luxury â€“ a statement of discerning taste that transcends trends. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

Q: What makes Oud Blanc different from traditional oud fragrances?

A: Traditional oud fragrances often feature heavy, intense profiles dominated by the rich, woody-animalic character of agarwood. Oud Blanc, however, represents a revolutionary approach by isolating and highlighting the brighter facets of oud, then pairing them with crisp citrus, delicate florals, and clean musk. The result is a more approachable, versatile interpretation that retains the precious character of oud while offering a fresher, more luminous experience suitable for contemporary fragrance lovers who appreciate sophistication with a modern twist.
short_description: Discover Oud Blanc Eau De Parfum, a sophisticated unisex fragrance that reimagines traditional oud with luminous brightness. This 75ml masterpiece blends citrus, white oud, rose, and amber for a contemporary yet timeless scent experience that embodies refined luxury.
seo_title: Oud Blanc EDP 75ml | Luxurious White Oud Fragrance | Save 15%
